Data Fields
Vps_DctrlEdgeInfo Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display Controller API

Structure containing edge information. Edge is a connection between two nodes i.e. two modules (like CIG and Blend) in VPS. VPS can be represented by a graph, where each module is node and edge is present between two nodes if they are connected. All VPS paths can be configured in one shot by IOCTL IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG. This IOCTL takes the array of edges connected between nodes. This structure is used to specify individual edge information. More...

#include <vps_displayCtrlDataTypes.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 startNode
 
UInt32 endNode
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing edge information. Edge is a connection between two nodes i.e. two modules (like CIG and Blend) in VPS. VPS can be represented by a graph, where each module is node and edge is present between two nodes if they are connected. All VPS paths can be configured in one shot by IOCTL IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG. This IOCTL takes the array of edges connected between nodes. This structure is used to specify individual edge information.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEdgeInfo::endNode

End node (VPS Module) of the edge

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEdgeInfo::startNode

Starting node (VPS Module) of the edge
